Tbilisi.name: Bassiani

Tbilisi.description: Art-filled café that hosts DJs and dance nights in an intimate setting.

Tbilisi.description: Swanky rooftop lounge with live acoustic/jazz and city views.

Tbilisi.name: El Centro
Tbilisi.description: Lively Latin-themed club with salsa nights and signature cocktails.

Tbilisi.description: Casual bar dedicated to chacha tastings, festive atmosphere.

Tbilisi.name: Wałszawa Tbilisi
Tbilisi.description: Retro-style diner-bar with Polish menu, cheap cocktails, open around the clock.

Batumi.name: Intourist Lounge
